content:
### Enhanced nodes

* [Google Drive:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/index.md) Added APP Properties and Properties options to the Upload operation of the File resource
* [HTTP Request:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.httprequest/index.md) Added the functionality to log the request to the browser console for testing
* [Notion:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.notion/index.md) Added the Include Time parameter date field types
* [Salesforce:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.salesforce.md) Added Upsert operation to Account, Contact, Custom Object, Lead, and Opportunity resources
* [Todoist:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.todoist.md) Added the Description option to the Task resource
